abstract.t: This document is a specification of version 5 of Network BlockTransfer Protocol (NETBLT), that is used for transferring largeamount of data. This protocol was firstly specified in RFC 969, thathas been made obsolete by RFC 998. Nevertheless, none of thesedocuments match current Internet Standards and are outdated.This document aligns the NETBLT specification with the most currentInternet Standards and obsoletes RFC 998.
